text: Machine Learning is a subset of Artificial Intelligence that provides systems the ability to automatically learn and improve from experience.

column4: the machine is trained using labeled data. It learns a mapping from inputs to outputs based on this data.

text: Unsupervised learning involves training without labeled data
column4: identifying patterns and groupings within the input data.

text: Reinforcement Learning trains agents to take actions to maximize cumulative rewards in an environment based on feedback.
Applications of Machine Learning include recommendation systems
